sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import AccountsUI from '../AccountsUI.jsx'; import NavSideBar from './NavSideBar.jsx'; var navSideBarOn = true; export const MainLayout = ({content}) => (
ABACUS LEARNING LAB {/* Nav Menu Hamburger Icon */}
{/* Horizontal Nav */}
Home Resolutions About
{/* Menu Sidebar */} {/* Main Content Section */}
{content}
{/* Footer on the bottom of the page */}
    • {/*
  • Instagram
  • Dribbble
    • */}
  • © Abacus Learning Lab
)
